basics.name: Galen Chang
basics.label: Computer Science Student
summary:
Prior 17C (Cyber Operations) in the U.S. Army

Currently studying Computer Science at the University of Hawaii at Manoa.

Expected graduation is in Spring, 2024.

education.institution: University of Hawaii at Manoa, Honolulu, HI
courses: Programming Courses using Java and Python

work.summary: Provide network defense for Hawaii Air National Guard systems and customers.
highlights: Maintain, update, and oversee official college newspaper website
Drive, design and build student-community projects for UH Manoa
Troubleshoot software, hardware and networking issues over the phone
Answer phone and email responses to the ITS Help Desk

volunteer.organization: Center for Renewable Energy and Island Sustainability
volunteer.summary: Lead developer for weather sensing project
highlights: Design firmware for distributed weather sensor network
Maintain custom data collection and storage infrastructure
Webmaster/IT Officer, IEEE Student Branch, UH Manoa, 2012-2013

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: First place
awards.summary: My team won first place in 2015.  See my portfolio site for more details.
